text: Va [ej pajomʙar, musulmonon] az tu dar ʙorai zanon nazarxohi mekunand; Bigu: "Alloh taolo dar ʙorai onon fatvo medihad va dar on ci az kitoʙ [Qur'on] ʙar sumo xonda mesavad, [niz] omadaast, ki [hukmi U] dar ʙorai duxtaroni jatime, ki haqqi muqarrarason [az mahrijai voris]-ro namepardozed va majl ʙa izdivoc ʙo onon nadored [va az ruji tama' dar amvolason ononro az izdivoc man' mekuned] va [hamcunin, dasturas dar mavridi] kudakoni notavon [in ast], ki: "Dar haqqi jatimon ʙa adlu insof ʙikused" va har on ci az nekiho, ki ancom medihed, Alloh taolo ʙa on ogoh ast
